_sText:
Sorry for my English, I am French =D.

It is my second map and I realized it in 2 days, it's the alpha version .

It represents a floor of my school and I made it mainly to have fun with friends of my school.

It's only my second map, I hope that it will please you ans your advices are welcome ^^

News : It's now the beta version :

- Bugs of textures corrected 
- New floor and new rooms 
- Secret passage added
- Less light 
- Flying tables and flying chairs corrected 
- Texture of the ceiling changed

And other corrected bugs...

________

I came back from holidays and I decided that this version would be final because I am not any more motivated to finish it and correct some bugs that it stays, have fun above!

I plan to create a new map , probably a de_ map .

My second map better worked than the first one, I hope that it will be the same thing
 for the third.

Good game all !!! =D
